citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 16:45-17:30
on 09-APR-18.
Arrived at facility. Knocked on door, called and texted to provided number with no response.
